Uduak Oscar noted that the Pistons showed heart when it mattered most, despite not being the favorites.
Portland's offensive firepower was acknowledged, but their defense was criticized for leaving them exposed in crunch time.

Cade Cunningham expressed pride in the team's effort, stating, 'I appreciate it a lot. It’s taken a lot of work from everybody. So, to be at this point right now, it feels good. A lot of games left, but this is a huge moment for us. I think it’s only something we can build on.'
